response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value and importance to us, and we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we are extending an offer to sell it to you at $950,000. We understand that this might be a substantial amount, but we are confident that the product's value aligns with your expectations and needs. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 950000}
